About Mowl Store

Founded by med students, for med students.
We understand your grind.

Our Mission

We believe medical students deserve quality products that support their wellbeing, without the hassle of endless scrolling and browsing. Mowl Store was founded to curate the best, most premium gear that actually helps you study smarter, feel amazing, and stay healthy during the toughest years of your life.

Meet the Team

Founded by a group of current medical students who understand the grind. We've been in your shoes cramming for exams, juggling clinical rotations, and balancing our health while pushing ourselves to the limit. That's why every product on Mowl Store has been tested and approved by people who actually live this life.

We're here to make your journey easier, one product at a time. Because taking care of yourself isn't a luxury, it's a necessity.
